page.title: 12SCHOOL QUESTIONNAIRE...2.
page.content: {(5)Q:WHAT DO YOU THINK OF THE WAY THE {SCHOOL IS RUN? eg.LESSONS AND THE {TIMETABLE. A:The school timetable is arranged quite adequately.The number of lessons per day is just right and they are just the right length so as not to get too boring. {(6)Q:WHAT DO YOU LIKE THE LEAST ABOUT {THE SCHOOL ? { }A:The restriction of our choice in subjects due to lack of facilities and time for the staff to teach us. {(7)Q:WHAT DO YOU LIKE BEST ABOUT THE {SCHOOL ? A:Lamlash school trusts its older pupils and gives them quite a bit of freedom and this gives an easy relationship in the school and pupils soon learn to become responsible.
